item.title: 'Our country is in danger': French PM takes confidence vote gamble over budget woes
item.description: France's CAC 40 index plunged 2% on Tuesday as analysts assessed the potential for a fresh period of political instability.

item.title: Trump tells Fed's Lisa Cook she's fired; she says 'he has no authority to do so'
item.description: President Donald Trump's removal of a Federal Reserve governor could end up being challenged at the Supreme Court.

item.title: Pentagon's innovation unit chief resigns in latest shake-up, sources say: Reuters

item.title: Trump touts 'great relationship' with Kim Jong-un as he meets South Korea's president
